features: 📝【Writable Storage Clipboard】Clipboards with a transparent top panel, transparent and waterproof, easy to carry, read files, even on harsh rainy days, it can keep your work files dry and safe, and allow you to easily access documents.

📝【All-In-One Storage Clipboards】 Dual-Layer design ensure roomy space for various needs of storage.You can keep frequently used documents on the top compartment. A second lower compartment is deep enough to store more than 300 sheets. Separate pen/pencil case for pens, markers, and other small items.

📝【Easy to Use】The convenient side opening allows easy access on the go. Sturdy latches keep both compartments securely closed to prevent losing personal items. The clip board surface is smooth and hard enough so you can write and draw on the surface even when you are standing.

📝【Premium Clipboard Folder】Clip board is made from high-impact, break-resistant plastic that is durable and won’t break. High-end quality and the unique hinge-and-clasp system allow it stands up to daily use and will not fall apart after millions of opens and closes.

📝【Multi-functional Clipboards with Storage】Size: 9.44" w x 1.45" d x 13.38" h. Serve the same purpose as a briefcase, whiteboard, presentation folder, storage unit for documents. Great for football coaching, truck driver, traveling teacher, Business, outside sports, and etc.
body.description: CLIPBOARD WITH STORAGE - Are you tired of crumpled paper?- Always looking for a great way to reuse diagrams?- Where'd your pen go? Well, throw all of those headaches away and lock down SFLHHDM’s Clipboard with Dual Compartment. SFLHHDM Nursing Clipboards will keep your documents in good condition with its rugged construction. Dual Storage clip board: Meet the need to carry a large number of documents, convenient to carry, can always find the files that you need. Storage Clipboards with Pen Holder: Separate pen/pencil case for pens, markers, and other small items. Low-profile Metal Clip with Corner Guard: Keep paperwork from blowing around and won't leave marks on the paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for on-the-go organization
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the storage clipboard and it has been a game-changer for me! As someone who is always on-the-go, I needed a solution to keep all of my important documents and paperwork organized and easily accessible. This storage clipboard does just that.One of the things I love about this clipboard is its durability. It's made of high-quality materials and can withstand daily wear and tear. The storage compartment is also spacious enough to hold a variety of items, including pens, notepads, and even my smartphone.Another great feature of this clipboard is the clip itself. It's strong and secure, which means I don't have to worry about my papers flying away or getting lost. The clip also has a built-in hanger, which allows me to easily hook it onto my bag or backpack for easy transport.Lastly, the design of the storage clipboard is nice and I use it for practicing calligraphy.Overall, I highly recommend the storage clipboard to anyone who needs a reliable and convenient solution for on-the-go organization. It's definitely worth the investment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for hybrid work / hotel desking
reviews.reviewText: Works well for my employer's new hybrid working model, with hotel desking. I keep my "desk stuff" in here (pens, pencils, highlighters, other office supplies, maybe a granola bar or other small snack), and can keep a couple of family photos and notes visible in the window (the kind of things I would pin to my cubicle wall if I still had my own desk). Good size, good price, sturdy enough, the clip holds tight, it packs and transports well, and the color is fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i got this product in the light purple color and its the exact same as the picture! its big enough to hold my paper work for work and i love that i can leave notes for myself on the clear part on the front. when i showed my coworkers and few of them even bought one as well 🤭 my only problem is that mine was delivered w a crack, but that’s on rough shipping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient at work
reviews.reviewText: We have so many forms and layouts we use at work. This case is handy to have to store these in, have extra’s but we love using the clear case on top to layout our semi loads to know what will fit in each one we ship. We like it’s erasable so we can use the same form for all our loads. Easy to open and close, durable, and easy to store. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable durable durable
reviews.reviewText: This clipboard is impressive. I have had mine for a couple months now and the front see thru partition you can still see thru. Most see thru plastic gets scratched easily but not this one. It has taken more falls than I want but it is still intact and perfect working order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I need for my job in one spot
reviews.reviewText: I first of all like the clear top sheet. I taped the chart I need to fill out under the clear sheet so it wouldn't shift. I then use a write on wet off marker (dry erase markers rub off with my sleeve) to fill it out. I got some Velcro and wrapped the soft side around the pen and put a strip of it at the top of the clip on the clipboard. Presto! A chart to fill out, my handy pen and I don't have to struggle for either one! Step one accomplished. I have a small device I have to take with me along with my smart tablet. These both fit inside along with a few papers. I have invoices that need to be signed. Those go in the clip on the clipboard. There is a small area for a pen (2 fit) that keeps my writing utensil at the bottom in case I lose the one out of my shirt pocket. I like I can grab one thing out of my car and go and not have to have a briefcase of separate items that I have to dig through. The side clip holding the case closed is sturdy. I've been using this a couple weeks and the clips are not showing any wear. My smart tablet is in an otter box case and still fits. I don't trust the plastic case to protect it in a fall. I'm pretty sure this case would hold up to a fall, but I'm not willing to drop mine to test it out. :) Hope you find this review helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this clipboard! I have one that was double the price..& yea it works, but it is NOT pink!! I love that this one came in my signature (& favorite!) color, the price was great, the quality is good, & it has plenty of room in both compartments! I can see papers I need constantly need to reference/view through the top, clear compartment & then the bigger/main storage area holds papers, post it pads, clips, & pens. It is awesome. I'd have 7 pieces of paper in the clear compartment currently, but it is versatile...you could make a collage type setup also with post it, stickers, etc & the bigger storage compartment can hold a variety of things as long as it is approx 1.5" thick or less. I don't write on the clear part w/ expo marker, but you definitely could if you needed too. So happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Projects!
reviews.reviewText: This is good to keep all your beautiful projects!
